document.full_text: more than 600,000 pounds ($967,000) has been raised for the seve ballesteros foundation from the special wentworth tribute to the late spaniard, organizers said tuesday.
document.title: pro-am tribute raises almost $1 million for seve foundation
lines_and_colors: more than 600,000 pounds ($967,000) has been raised for the seve ballesteros foundation from the special wentworth tribute to the late spaniard, organizers said tuesday.
